alert.note: Alert for Laclede; Wright (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued February 16 at 1:31AM CST until February 16 at 1:45AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM CST FOR WRIGHT...NORTHEASTERN DOUGLAS AND SOUTHEASTERN LACLEDE COUNTIES... At 131 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles south of Richland to 10 miles northwest of Houston to 12 miles north of Cabool to 10 miles south of Mountain Grove, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mountain Grove, Dawson, Norwood, Hartville, Twin Bridges, Competition, Manes, Brushyknob, Lynchburg, Graff, Falcon, Vanzant and Dry Knob. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
